name: ElectricSandbox
description:
PROTOTYPE
A 2.5d top down simulation game. In the spirit of Minecraft's Redstone system you have a few basic components you can use in this game. There is the LED, which is black when no electricity is applied and turns white when it is powered. You can arrange large amounts of LED's to emulate dot matrix displays that you can drive using logic circuitry you design using the transistor component (a simple and-gate). There is a switch and button that allow you to interact with the flow of current directly as the player. The intention of the game is to be purpose built to enable the creation of complex electronic devices like binary calculators or even computers (much like people create with Redstone).
